title: Barterer

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Check someone during the day to buy their ability at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You start the game with a bartering chip.
- During the day, select someone. You learn their abilities at the start of the night.
- You can choose to trade with them, taking their abilities and giving them your original ability.
- If you take the ability of an informed minority, the informed minority will be informed you are on their team, but you will not join their chat.
- People who have their ability traded for the bartering chip will keep their original win condition.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Complete the goal of the ability you have.
